name: A Murder Mystery In Minnesota
description:
Cosmos, Minnesota, January 20th, 2004. Gerald Loughlin lies dead in a pool of his own blood. Four days from now, Gerald Loughlin will lie dead in a pool of his blood on January 20th, 2004. At the request of one of Gerald’s remaining relatives, Jimmy Oden, a private investigator who knew the family growing up, returns to town to solve Gerald’s murder and deduce the reason behind this unknown timeloop in A Murder Mystery in Minnesota.

Project Lead - Aaron Curry

Project Manager - Paul Manley

Narrative Lead - Sam Beinlich

Art Lead - Adam Gacke

Narrative Designer - Julian Buettgenback

Artist - Dale Thorpe

Audio - Davis Schmidt
